pullRequest.title: Hide inline variable commands when no reference found
pullRequest.bodyText:
Just hide meanless refactor commands when a variable has no reference. The following gifs show the effect of this PR.

nodes.bodyText: Since refactoring.checkInitialialConditions() will also invoke refactoring.getReferences() and cache the result to a field. The second call refactoring.getReferences() will just return the previous result, and no extra cost.
